title: Jason Ritter
summary:
Jason Morgan Ritter (born February 17, 1980) is an American actor and producer. He is known for his work in television series' such as Joan of Arcadia, The Class, The Event, Gravity Falls, and Raising Dion. He also played the recurring role of Mark Cyr on NBC's Parenthood (2010–2014), for which he received an Emmy Award nomination, and starred as Kevin Finn in the ABC comedy series Kevin (Probably) Saves the World (2017–2018).
Ritter made his feature film  debut with a small role in Mumford (1999). Subsequent credits have included Swimfan (2002), Freddy vs. Jason (2003), Happy Endings (2005), The Education of Charlie Banks (2007), The Deal, Good Dick, W. (all 2008), A Bag of Hammers, The Perfect Family (both 2011), Wild Canaries (2014), The Meddler (2015), Bitch (2017), and The Tale (2018). He also voiced the character Ryder in Frozen II (2019).  Ritter is married to actress Melanie Lynskey, with whom he has a daughter.
